document.full_text: the tribeca film festival, born as a way to revive downtown manhattan after the september 11 attacks, turns ten this week and is leading a push for new ways for audiences to watch independent films.
document.title: tribeca film festival turns ten
lines_and_colors: the tribeca film festival, born as a way to revive downtown manhattan after the september 11 attacks, turns ten this week and is leading a push for new ways for audiences to watch independent films.
